item.title: New Zealand’s Parliament Suspends Maori Lawmakers Over Haka Protest
item.description: The harsh penalty was handed down to three members of the opposition who said they were voicing their community’s displeasure with proposed legislatio...

item.title: New Zealand Parliament Suspends Lawmakers for Haka Dance Protest
item.description: Co-leaders of the Te Pāti Māori party, Rawiri Waititi and Debbie Ngarewa-Packer, were suspended on Thursday without pay for 21 days, and another membe...

item.title: Trump Travel Order Bans People From 12 Countries From Entering U.S.
item.description: The travel ban revives an effort from President Trump’s first term that led to chaos and court battles.

item.title: Syrians Rejoice at Being Exempted From Trump Travel Ban
item.description: Damascus residents hope the decision is another sign that the world is normalizing relations with Syria after the overthrow of Bashar al-Assad.

item.title: Trump and Xi Hold Call, China Says
item.description: Chinese state media said the leaders spoke by phone on Thursday, amid worsening tensions between Washington and Beijing.
